description:
Description
Numeric codes and names of 50 states and the District of Columbia,
required to parse Keith Poole
and Howard Rosenthal's collections of U.S. Congressional roll calls.
title: information about the American states needed for U.S. Congress
reference:
The function readKH converts the integer ICPSR codes
into strings, via a table lookup in this data frame.  Another table
lookup in state.abb provides the 2-letter abbreviation
commonly used in identifying American legislators, e.g.,
KENNEDY, E (D-MA).

parameters.year: numeric or NA, year of statehood
parameters.icpsr:
integer, numeric code for state used by the
Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research
parameters.state:
character, name of state or Washington
	D.C.

format:
icpsrinteger, numeric code for state used by the
Inter-university Consortium for Political and Social Research

statecharacter, name of state or Washington
	D.C.

yearnumeric or NA, year of statehood
